utterance: What can I use QuickXMarket for?
answer: The platform may be used to place orders for food, groceries, essentials, and to request dispatch services. You agree to use the platform only for lawful purposes within the university and surrounding areas.

utterance: How do orders and payments work?
answer: All orders placed are considered confirmed once payment is successful. Payments can be made via debit/credit card, transfer, wallet, or other approved methods. You are responsible for reviewing your order details before confirming.

utterance: Can I cancel my order?
answer: Orders may be canceled within 5 minutes of placement unless the vendor has already started preparing the item.

utterance: How do refunds work?
answer: Refunds are processed only if the order was canceled in time or if an issue occurred (e.g., undelivered or wrong order). Refunds will be issued to your original payment method or platform wallet.

utterance: Where are deliveries made?
answer: Deliveries are made to dorms, departments, or other approved campus locations. It is your responsibility to be available to receive the delivery at the scheduled time.

utterance: What happens if I'm not available for delivery?
answer: If you're unreachable after 5 minutes, the order may be returned, and re-delivery may incur extra charges.

utterance: When is QuickXMarket available?
answer: QuickXMarket operates Monday to Sunday, 8:00 AM - 9:00 PM. Service may be unavailable temporarily due to maintenance, weather, or university restrictions.

utterance: How should I behave on the platform?
answer: You agree to treat vendors, riders, and support staff with respect. Abusive behavior, false complaints, or fraudulent activities will result in account suspension.

utterance: Are promotions guaranteed?
answer: Promotions are offered at QuickXMarket's discretion and may be withdrawn or modified at any time. Misuse of discount codes or referral bonuses may lead to account suspension.

utterance: Can I use QuickXMarket content without permission?
answer: All content, logos, and branding on the platform are the property of QuickXMarket and may not be copied or used without permission.

utterance: Is QuickXMarket liable for delays or lost items?
answer: QuickXMarket is not liable for delays due to traffic, weather, or vendor backlog; product quality issues (vendors are responsible); or losses resulting from user error (e.g., incorrect delivery address).

utterance: Can my account be suspended or terminated?
